ygData.subject: Soloing
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all! I am a level 28 bard on the Rallos Zek server.  I play some odd hours, wake up in the middle of the night and need my EQ fix etc. : ) I would love
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all!
I am a level 28 bard on the Rallos Zek server. I play some odd hours, wake up in the middle of the night and need my EQ fix etc. : ) I would love input into what I could possibly solo at my level. I use a demon claw and a tomahawk as weapons, and seem to use bellow alot in fights. Also keep in mind that since I am on PvP I can not use all songs the same way other bards do. If anyone is around my non-party spells effect them and I hate to go around putting everyone to sleep all the time.

Thanks,
Infiniti
